sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_ID , C.DEPT_NM , A.ENGINEER_CNT FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(YM, 1, 4) AS YEAR , SUBSTR(YM, 5, 2) AS MON , DEPT_ID , ENGINEER_CNT FROM BSC_I_USER_NUMBER) A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_GHF0221D_001 B ON A.YEAR = B.SUMM_YY AND A.MON = B.SUMM_MM AND A.DEPT_ID = B.BR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO C ON A.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# AND BR_CD NOT IN ('2200', '3100', '3J00') AND (ROLE_TC = '01' OR (ROLE_TC = '04' AND INSP_KIND_TC IN ('01', '03', '04'))) GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.MON, A.DEPT_ID, C.DEPT_NM, A.ENGINEER_CNT ORDER BY C.DEPT_NM ASC

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND OULEVEL < 2

SELECT YEAR , METRIC_ID , CAL_TYPE_COL , CAL_TYPE_COL_NM , INSERT_GUBUN FROM BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.METRIC_ID = 'M008110' AND A.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY A.CAL_TYPE_COL ASC

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
